job description:
We are looking for Data Analyst for our direct client at SanFrancisco, CA.Min 2 yrs of experience in Data Analysis Strong communication skills (verbal and written)Strong data analytical skills (preferably someone who has worked in data warehouse background)Documentations skills to be able to create STMs, DFDs, Data dictionary, technical requirements.Motivated individual to drive the delivery of entire solution starting from working with customers to understand business problem till the final solution delivery. - provided by Dice Data Warehousing, Data dictionary
Associated topics: data administrator, data analyst, data analytic, data architect, data manager, data management, data quality, data warehousing, database administrator, erp
